contact.title: Contact Information
contact.name: Name
contact.successMessage: Thanks for contacting me. I will get back to you soon.

0.title: Java Enterprise & Microservices
0.desc: My core expertise lies in building robust and scalable backend systems using Java and the Spring ecosystem. I specialize in designing RESTful APIs and Microservices architectures, ensuring high performance and security for enterprise-level applications.

1.title: DevOps & Cloud Native
1.desc: I don't just write code; I deploy it. I have hands-on experience with DevOps practices including Docker containerization, Kubernetes orchestration, and CI/CD pipelines. I focus on automating workflows to ensure reliable and fast deployments.

2.title: Full Stack JavaScript (MERN)
2.desc: Versatility is my strength. Beyond Java, I am proficient in the JavaScript ecosystem. I build dynamic user interfaces with React.js and develop lightweight, non-blocking backends using Node.js and Express. This allows me to adapt to any technical stack required.

3.title: AI Integration (Spring AI)
3.desc: I am passionate about the future of technology. I integrate Artificial Intelligence into web solutions using Spring AI, bridging the gap between traditional software development and LLMs to create intelligent, data-driven applications.

4.title: Agile & Collaboration
4.desc: Trained in active pedagogy, I thrive in Agile/Scrum environments. I am proficient in using Jira for project management, participating in sprints, and collaborating effectively via Git/GitHub. I value clean code and continuous learning.

0.title: YouCode (UM6P)
0.detail: Intensive training based on active pedagogy (Simplon). Mastery of modern technologies (Spring Boot / Angular), Agile/Scrum methodology, and realization of concrete projects.

1.title: Faculty of Sciences Semlalia
1.detail: Acquisition of fundamentals in computer science, mathematics, and algorithmic logic. Validation of two years of higher education.

2.title: Akensous High School
2.detail: Option Mathematical Sciences A. Acquisition of a strong analytical and logical mind.

0.title: YouCode (Academic Projects)
0.desc: Development of complex web applications. Teamwork, version control (Git/GitHub), and adherence to deadlines.

1.title: Freelance & Self-learning
1.desc: Period dedicated to self-learning. Exploration of Web development basics, realization of technical challenges, and strengthening of programming logic.

recommendationsData.name: Shahmir Minhas
recommendationsData.designation: React JS | NEXT JS | Node | GraphQL
recommendationsData.view: Hello everyone! I wanted to take a moment to recommend Safia for any React.js opportunity. I had the pleasure of working with her on several projects where she demonstrated a strong understanding of React.js and Next.js concepts and delivered high-quality code. She consistently showed a willingness to learn and grow, and her enthusiasm for taking on new challenges was contagious. Safia is a reliable and dedicated team member who would be a major asset to any React.js team. Highly recommended! üëç! üåü

recommendationsData.name: Sikandar Hayat
recommendationsData.designation: Data Scientist | Machine Learning Engineer | Python Developer
recommendationsData.view: I had the privilege of working alongside Safia on several university projects, and I must say her talent and work ethic really stood out. Recently, we were both part of the dynamic team at JMM Technologies, where Safia's professionalism and attention to detail shone. I wholeheartedly support Safia for any opportunity requiring a highly skilled and dedicated individual.

recommendationsData.name: Nasir Khan
recommendationsData.view: I highly recommend Safia as a talented React frontend developer with an incredible flair for UI/UX design. Her mastery of Node.js further strengthens her capabilities, allowing her to build robust and scalable applications. Safia's attention to detail, problem-solving skills, and dedication to delivering exceptional results make her a valuable addition to any development team.

recommendationsData.name: Muhammad Ullah
recommendationsData.view: I highly recommend Safia for frontend web development positions. Her expertise in ReactJS and Next.js, combined with her professionalism and dedication, make her an invaluable asset to any team.

reviewsData.clientReview: It is always a pleasure working with her. The work is completed quickly and she does more than what is asked of her. It is also clear that she has a great knowledge of the work she does. I look forward to our next collaboration.
She is very good at communication and is an experienced web developer, a great experience working with her.

Safia is extremely competent and helpful. She knows web application development inside out. Her understanding of different technologies and frameworks in this field is also very impressive. I hope to have the chance to work with her again.
I worked with Safia and she is very professional and an excellent software developer. I admire her speed of development and the quality of her work when given a mission.

intro.designation: Full Stack Java/Angular | Microservices Architect | Cloud Native Developer

portfolioData.projectDetail: Revolutionize your coding journey with OpenCode. An immersive e-learning platform offering ultra-smooth navigation (SPA) and an intuitive dashboard to track your progress. Built with React.js and Laravel for optimal performance.

Optimize your supply chain with SmartLogi. A powerful and scalable backend API capable of handling complex data flows. Robust architecture based on Spring Boot and Java 17, with sharp SQL performance optimization.
